local_intent: Perform side-grasp on the red cylinder after confirming visibility and alignment, then verify grasp stability and object presence.
assumptions: Red cylinder is within reachable workspace
Object pose allows side grasp with 1 cm alignment tolerance
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around the grasp phase: visibility check -> open gripper -> precise approach/alignment -> Pick(std_side, 2000ms) -> verify stable grasp and object in gripper.
